Reviews.Content: Excellent buy, for an IPad of this quality.  I bought two, one for my wife, and one for me.  This is an upgrade for me, and her first.  I know she will love having her own.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying the iPad
Reviews.Author: Becky S. Curtis
Reviews.Content: This is my daughter's second iPad. We haven't looked into the AT&T; data plan yet. Works great with WiFi! She uses it often. Looking forward to checking out the AT&T; data plan; hoping it won't be too expensive.

Reviews.Title: Everyone in the family loves it
Reviews.Author: Julie K. White
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son but his whole family loves it.  His son loves playing games, they all love watching movies and it's a great portable light weight answer to a computer for travel!

Reviews.Title: Hat finder
Reviews.Author: Hat finder
Reviews.Content: Bought for my husband.  He likes it very much.  He was very frustrated to have to shift from Blackberry phone which he loved to Motorola Droid.  His place of employment no longer supported the Blackberry device. This IPad 4 is much more user friendly and he can use it for everything except the phone calls for which he still uses the Droid phone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Tarita Murphy
Reviews.Content: I love this thing, it came fully charge so I used it straight from the box it's fast and easy to sync to my iTunes, and the battery life is awesome.

Reviews.Title: First apple product
Reviews.Author: Michael Gignac
Reviews.Content: First time for an apple product, am satisfied so far. Service from apple is fast and helpful, battary life of the unit is good.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4 is the best
Reviews.Author: Patrick W. Rutherford
Reviews.Content: Love this thing! MUCH better than the iPad 1 I had years ago.  Can do so much more.Love it.

Reviews.Title: Ipad is great
Reviews.Author: StoneCreek Mercantile
Reviews.Content: No issues..easy to use. My wife wants one.it is heavier than her kindle. Need this for work as it is the only OS we can use for my job.

Reviews.Title: Love it love it love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Noah Schrock "Noah"
Reviews.Content: I always wanted the iPad but knew they coul be pretty pricey but this was the best deal around and we could not be happier! We love having the 128 GB so we have plenty of storage. Absolutely amazing!

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Shirley Flowers
Reviews.Content: Got my new I Pad Love using it at church and every where I go. It has all the best features I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: apple fan
Reviews.Author: Mary Hill
Reviews.Content: every thing I expected from Apple! Can now use all the apps I have been longing to use!  Love my games!

Reviews.Title: IPad w/retina 4 th Generation
Reviews.Author: Shirley A Jones
Reviews.Content: My Ipad w/ retina Outstanding and picture excellant! Easy to follow.Most of all keep all of the icons inordet. Shirleyj

Reviews.Title: Does exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: G. Unlimited
Reviews.Content: While I would love to see a card reader and a usb or port of some kind for data transfer the purpose of this review isn't to try to redesign the iPad. It's exactly what I expected when I bought it and it does what I need for it to do (and more) very well.

Reviews.Title: I pad 3
Reviews.Author: Don R.
Reviews.Content: the only problem is I cant get it to charge from my ac addapter and ac outlet! it only charges from a radio shack power source that is portable.  not sure why

Reviews.Title: excellent,
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I gave my wife my old Ipad and bought this one, I love it, use it for everything.  Do a lot of reading with it and it works great.  Does most anything I need, hardly use my laptop anymore.  It is not dramatically different from my old one.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: THERESE E FULLEN
Reviews.Content: Love the product, the price was great, the shipping was within reason given the time of year, I ordered early as this was a christmas gift and had it in plenty of time.  the iPad is a great product, I purchased this for my husband as Ive had mine for over two years and love it, he was using a big bulky laptop and this is perfect for around the home for him, he loves to watch DIY videos etc. and the screen is nice size for this.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Joe R "Joe R"
Reviews.Content: The delivery was delayed quite a bit.  Apple should include or build-in a screen protector.  I had to pay extra to get those.  When we connect the genuine 'lightining' cable that came with the iPad, it always says it is not for this product.

Reviews.Title: iPad 128 GB with retina display newest addition.
Reviews.Author: Tina McCartney
Reviews.Content: This iPad was everything I expected it to be  and more.  The whole family loves it even my three-year-old grandson . It's very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Itsa Christmas gift for mg wife
Reviews.Author: Ronald Osbahr Buenjer
Reviews.Content: And sie is Berg happy and satified.Trat is all I can sah so far today mornig and mg wird is traveling

Reviews.Title: Gift for my mom
Reviews.Author: MichelleP
Reviews.Content: And she absolutely loves it.  She takes it everywhere and uses the camera for everything.  It's a great product and a great price.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Shane Grant
Reviews.Content: Very good tablet. Display is nice and clear and touch screen feature is a plus. Camera function is great and picture quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: First Ipad and I made the right choice
Reviews.Author: MuddaDatsme
Reviews.Content: I love this Ipad and use it more then my laptop.  This is my first ipad that I have owned and it has not disappointed.  Bought it from an independent seller that gave me an incredible price.ProsFast processorRetina display is amazing and crispBattery life is greatConsNone to date.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Dale Hall
Reviews.Content: Love it have had it for over a month ago, Easier to read books on, no problems with using it with I tunes, Well packaged for safe delivery

Reviews.Title: Easy to Learn
Reviews.Author: Patti Bray
Reviews.Content: Works well as expected.  Easy to use.We use it to video water skiing from a boat.  For this it works even better than we expected.  The skiers can come in and immediately watch their sets and see their mistakes.  We also use it to email, still pictures, and Facebook.

Reviews.Title: BUY IT......seriously buy it you'll love it
Reviews.Author: Joseph Tyckowski
Reviews.Content: absolutely love it. apple has once again exceeded my expectations. my suggestion go with the 32 or 64GB. when you buy it make sure you buy screen protector too. don't wait until you get then buy the screen protectors.

Reviews.Title: What more can one say?
Reviews.Author: Ross Konikoff
Reviews.Content: Words not needed. Elegant machine and excellent shipping. This toy has become a part of life. That, with ease of purchase spells satisfaction %100!

Reviews.Title: i-pad 4 with retina display
Reviews.Author: Vicki Ball
Reviews.Content: Great!! Everything I expected..........Fast deliveryFast setup, works very fast, retina display is awesome.I would recommend this to anyone that is looking for an I-pad

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Kdal
Reviews.Content: I needed this item for my music production as it will play a very important part for live performance, Works well although I should have waited to get the iPad Air but this will do. As the times they are a changing this iPad will prove itself and pay for itself too!!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: 1beachhouse
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad!  I carry it now instead of my laptop!!!  What a convenience!  And it is so much lighter than the laptop so when you are travelling, it makes it so much lighter, plus I don't have another bag to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: xiaolei
Reviews.Content: The iPad is good and the price is good , it's very convenient to use it to receive email and shopping on internet.

Reviews.Title: Fine
Reviews.Author: MERIC DE BELLEFON
Reviews.Content: Delivery was perfect. The product is fine, as expected, except the fact that some apps do not run for the moment, this beeing gradually corrected by the editor

Reviews.Title: Improvement from the older ones.
Reviews.Author: Ronnie
Reviews.Content: As soon as I got this iPad, I updated it to the newest version, since I have read other users had headaches with the older OS with the 3D look.  So far, it works great.  No headaches.  As with all the iPads, the touch works great, very responsive, does not lag or anything.One major improvement I noticed when comparing this to the older ones (I had all the older iPads) the speaker seems much louder.  This was a big problem with the older ones, especially watching videos.  I had to really listen closely, and read lips to figure out what was being said.  This is loud and clear.

Reviews.Title: iPads for all!
Reviews.Author: D. Larsen
Reviews.Content: This is a great iPad and can make anyone a lot more productive (work) or waste your day away (leisure). There are a lots of apps, and a whole lot of great features to get you going! Love you Siri!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: PAT MCCARTY
Reviews.Content: I love this .. carry it with me to work every day so I can do my homework during lunch.. very clear and the sound is great..

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Eyas Dudin
Reviews.Content: Very nice item at a great price this is an item I've been looking for for a while as a gift for my family.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: jennie "Jennie L Knudson"
Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad keeps crashing tho...I have to reset it alot timely delivery and everything else is fine

Reviews.Title: My husband is enjoying it.
Reviews.Author: Steph-chan (kgilbert@parkave.net)
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my husband, to replace an earlier edition iPad. Item arrived promptly and in good condition. The only disappointment was that the iPad Air came out within a couple weeks of the purchase, so it felt like I paid full price for the "old" edition.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Ronald D Boesiger
Reviews.Content: Wonderful way to read magazines, find up to date news and communicate with friends and family! Great battery life too!

Reviews.Title: My lovely iPad
Reviews.Author: Ahmad Mahdi
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a book reader to help me with my study. After long period of searching and trying different products I opt to choose the new iPad with retina display. It's great with all this word carry in meanings. Screen size is just right for everything you want to do with no restrictions. Apps are for everything, games, etc.I don't think there is anything wrong with this guy, love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Ray&eva
Reviews.Content: As always, Apple delivers a high quality product that is easy to use. Just remember to buy a case for it. I recommend the Roo case brand

Reviews.Title: Love my new ipad
Reviews.Author: Lisa M Kobelis
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love my new iPad!!  I'm always on it. Have had a kindle and a nook tablet in the past and prefer my iPad to either tablet, can just do so much more with an iPad!

Reviews.Title: Ipad with retina display
Reviews.Author: Jean Sardinas
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it.  So sharp a picture.  It was a great decision to purchase this one instead of the standard IPad.  Well worth the extra memory and money spent.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Item!
Reviews.Author: tufunuf
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this Ipad! It is everything that I expected it to be. And, there is no other place like Amazon when it comes to purchasing an item you want. They stand behind EVERYTHING they sell. Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Greatest iPad yet
Reviews.Author: Timothy Hannes
Reviews.Content: Switching from the iPad 2 to this device, I immediately noticed the retina display. The resolution is noticeably better even when your just browsing in Safari. I would recommend this item to anyone looking for a tablet that they will use often to surf the web.

Reviews.Title: Don't know why I waited so long...
Reviews.Author: Lory & David Pratt
Reviews.Content: Could never understand why if I had a desktop and a laptop computer, why I would need or want an iPad. But now I get it!  The Retina Display is beautiful!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Paw Paw
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 9 IPads for my kids and family for college, leisure, and communicating. This recent purchase will be #10 for my daughter to assist her with her college studies. I also purchased an Otterbox Defender Hornet Series case to protect the IPad, which I highly recommend.  The iPad has an outstanding battery life, the applications are functional and streamlined into the system for an effortless use.  The are many free apps for leisure activities , as well as for professional applications such as Microsoft power point, excel, and word. I'm impressed with the wireless printing function, which integrates well with documents, photos, and spread sheets.  This is an amazing product, it's convent and easy to carry, I hardly ever use my MacBook Pro.

Reviews.Title: Well, it's designed by Apple.
Reviews.Author: Johan Tideskog
Reviews.Content: The iPad is a device that I thought I didn't need since I have an iPhone and a MacBook Pro. But I really benefit from all those apps designed for iPad that really makes it worth its prize. It's just what I use for those tasks when work takes me away from the office over the day and not longer.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Huijing Lin
Reviews.Content: This item is very useful for my study. And its screen really clear ,I can use it to watch PDF and take notes.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Wang Changxing
Reviews.Content: I love this! It feel so wonderful! And I really enjoy to have this Ipad for study and entertainment, cool.

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: Bradley A. Besore
Reviews.Content: Received item when promised Item work very good in fact I love this item easy to operated does everything it promises to do would recommend seller and item to anyone

Reviews.Title: I love my iPad
Reviews.Author: im1stsp
Reviews.Content: I'm so happy I ordered this iPad. I love it and never leave home without it. Now I don't have to take my laptop everywhere is go. Great item, you will not be disappointed with this gem..

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Danilo Soares dos Santos
Reviews.Content: Better then I could imagine. Exceeded my expectations. I recommend it for everyone which is looking for a nice tablet.

Reviews.Title: A Terrific Product For Special Needs Children
Reviews.Author: Stasia Nielsen "tiastasia"
Reviews.Content: This was an incredible help for us as a family.  We have a daughter with Autism and although she is high functioning, as any parent of a special needs child knows, life holds many challenges for special needs families.The iPad came in the box ready to go.  I simply plugged it into the wall and the wifi picked up all the tablet needed to know.  This made life easier for me.  It connected right to my iTunes account and I was easily able to share her special apps.We use it mainly to calm her, and direct her with terrific apps such as ChoiceWorks and other learning tools.  She began communicating much better and when we are out, we bring it with the headphones so she can listen to music.  We have noticed a decrease in frustrating meltdowns.I use it often as well, for writing and for other work related things I do that needs a computer on the go.  ALl of my desktop programs have apps that I can access and upload via the iPad.  I truly love it.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: ddew
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband to use in our medical office.  It is great -- just occasional issues with the internet browser freezing up, but really a great product.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad w/Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Ned Pendleton
Reviews.Content: It is a gift to my wife who is being treated for ovarian cancer.  She watches her favorite TV shows (Castle, for one) and plays solitaire during her chemo treatments that can take 4 or 5 hours.  She loves it.

Reviews.Title: Trouble with brightness setting
Reviews.Author: luisjms
Reviews.Content: Not sure if I received a defective Ipad, but the brightness setting frequently become very bright even with the auto brightness switch turned off. For the price paid I am not a happy camper.

Reviews.Title: Great product and service.
Reviews.Author: Dan Johnson
Reviews.Content: Got my iPad without being hassled to purchase AppleCare a thousand times, so I'm extremely satisfied.  The product was shipped quickly and accurately and I was offered plenty of assistance online for setup and help.  I would highly recommend the seller of this product.

Reviews.Title: Nice iPad
Reviews.Author: Douglas Rose
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it and I like it when I get to use it.  I think it is what you expect from Apple!

Reviews.Title: good condition
Reviews.Author: yanfei ma
Reviews.Content: I got it and used it. I think it is good until now. My son played games with the ipad.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Butler
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad but I love this thing.  It has taken some time and will take more to learn the functionality but so no issues.  I do have it attached to a keyboard (see my NewTrent review) so it automatically shuts the iPad off when closed so I have not had to charge it for over 4 days.The sensitivity is great when playing games or switching pages.  The display itself is simply amazing.  I know it's a bit pricy but the 128gb also leaves you without a worry of filling the thing up or having to delete anything to download or try something new.

Reviews.Title: It's Perfect
Reviews.Author: PRINCESS MONEY
Reviews.Content: Everything you love or desire about an ipad is here. I have no complaints except there is a little lag when using certain apps....but isn't that the apps fault?

Reviews.Title: Apple has done it again!
Reviews.Author: S. J. Jewett
Reviews.Content: The Retina Display is adjustable to the light in your environment.  iPad quickly downloads programs and is super easy to use!  If you're even thinking about a tablet, this is the one to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Difei Zhou
Reviews.Content: I m a pilot,the iPad helps me a lot,I do not need to take so many books with me any more. The iPad 4 also did vary well in games

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Girlybug
Reviews.Content: I finally got on the IPAD bandwagon. I absolutely love it! I am still learning how to used it, compatible applications and what accessories are available.  Woohoo!!!

Reviews.Title: My 2nd iPad
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Deal
Reviews.Content: I purchased my first iPad over a year ago - what was that?  the iPad 2, I think?  I used it every single day and loved it...but my husband was starting to get jealous.  Even though he had a laptop, he wanted a tablet, too. So, like any good husband, he bribed me.I could get a brand new iPad if he could adopt my older one.  DEAL!!!So now I'm the proud owner of the iPad with Retina display.  I will tell you.....I really don't notice much of a difference between this one and my older one.  But, I still love it!

Reviews.Title: What I expected
Reviews.Author: Frosty
Reviews.Content: However shipper sent me defective unit (Got Electronics.) But I was able to get a replacement w/out too much difficulty.

Reviews.Title: iPad 16GB
Reviews.Author: ADREON
Reviews.Content: This was a requirement for High School; my Son commandeered it immediately.  Has it running his "ebooks", as well as games.  Easy to use!Delivery was super fast!!!

Reviews.Title: I love my IPad
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use and easy to take with when you need to. I like the bigger size, it's much easier to read than the mini.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Anthony M. Coy
Reviews.Content: Item was delivered as promised and met all the expectations that i had for the iPad.  Would definitely buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: kenneth roberts
Reviews.Content: I use it all the time and love it. An awesome product from apple like everything else in their line of products

Reviews.Title: wow,
Reviews.Author: E.S.Bainbrudge
Reviews.Content: what colours, clear easy to read screen, just superb. Had a regular ipad 2 before, this is so much better

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Richard A. DeFere
Reviews.Content: Can't believe the price offered on this iPad. Received the unit within a week and was packaged well. Very east to set up and all my purchased items were stored on the cloud and downloaded easily. Very happy with the iPad 4

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Satish
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad and I got a 32 gb. Gifted it to my dearest wife. She is loving it.

Reviews.Title: The best Ipad ever
Reviews.Author: rafael
Reviews.Content: Faster, Cooler, and definitely much better than its ancestors. I have had the two previous ones and definitely love this. Great purchase!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love my iPad
Reviews.Author: Good Shopper
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my iPAD. So glad I bought it with the wi fi.Love the white color matches mi iPhone 5.Set them both up on my Version account linked them together.

Reviews.Title: Great new iPad!
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Fast, great screen and handles all the high powered apps I needed. an improvement over the original ipad.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: I was finally able to get an i-pad through Amazon.com!
Reviews.Author: V. K. Walker
Reviews.Content: I have wanted one of these I-pads since they came out, but was finally able to get one. It is so versatile and useful in many situations where using my lap-top would be difficult. I love it!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: jarrett thrash
Reviews.Content: This nothing more to say for this because it speak for it self the apple iPad 4 god I'm glad I bought this baby for me for movies, games and music and I bought it for my mother for work and to keep in touch will all of us.

Reviews.Title: Great, as expected!
Reviews.Author: Maria Pilar Isaurralde
Reviews.Content: The IPad works great, everything was as expected. I love it! I decided yo buy the one without 3G and I think it was a good decision.

Reviews.Title: A good product
Reviews.Author: Tevel Inc
Reviews.Content: Amazing item.Works very well so far. Very good for pictures and video.will definitely recommend to everyone. Easy to carry and use.

Reviews.Title: This is just I what I need!
Reviews.Author: Alejandro V.
Reviews.Content: The quality of the item exceeded my expectations, honestly. As far the product itself, I really enjoy it everyday. I'm not a basic user. That is, I wasn't looking for a tablet just to surf the internet or listen music like many people do. They look for all these expensive items, and never use all its potential. An iPad is a real powerful tool. You can automate tasks, help you organize yourself, save on text messages, calls, learn through downloadble apps, etc. All this in a single item. If you're looking for a tablet to just surf the internet, listen to music, facebook, just buy something else. The power and potential of the iPad doesn't deserve to be on standby forever.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Charlotte E Ostermann
Reviews.Content: I had an IPAD2 but wanted more GB so got this IPAD. The Retina display is amazing!! I have been taking pictures on my IPHONE with HRD....when you see them on the IPAD they are simply beautiful. Also any of the Apps that are in HD are terrific. I love the IPAD...so easy to,use but I am a little prejudice when it comes to Apple. We have IMACs..Air Books..mini IPads..IPhones..IPODS...what's not to love!???????

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Amazing product although I don't know if it is retina display. It works fantastic screen looks great. Pictures look great. I like the apps you can get for free.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Leah
Reviews.Content: I was somewhat skeptical of purchasing this online for my 9 year old son. However it arrived on time and we were all pleased and my son of course was extatic to say the least.I did purchase the square trade protection plan as well.

Reviews.Title: This thing is great...
Reviews.Author: Mark Meeks
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone that I used to use to play games, but haven't used it for that since getting this.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product, Fast Delivery as always with AMAZON
Reviews.Author: Paula delaPena
Reviews.Content: Very very happy with the product. The ipad4 is an awesome device. My son works for APPLE so it really helps with getting to know all of it's capabilities.

Reviews.Title: I love this product
Reviews.Author: mattelynn renee hardesty
Reviews.Content: Product was in great condition, I use it more than my cellphone and laptop. I Cant put it down <3

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Zip_it
Reviews.Content: So, I didn't think that I would use this much.  I've had a Kindle Fire, but decided to get the iPad and glad I did.  It is just so much easier to use and quick.  Picture is crisp and bright.

Reviews.Title: More than I hoped
Reviews.Author: Reading Angel
Reviews.Content: I have owned an iPad first generation for several years and used it mostly when I traveled. I saw other people using their camera equipped iPads and thought I might like that and the ability to use FaceTime away from home.I was more than pleased with this latest version of Apple's iPad.The display is amazing. I find that I use it all the time, at home as well as away from home.I love doing a back up in the Cloud. The transfer using Cloud from my old to new iPad was effortless. With in a couple of minutes everything I needed, apps, contacts and music was ready to go.

Reviews.Title: Apple ipad with retina
Reviews.Author: Nicholas A. Ferranti
Reviews.Content: My grand-daughter loved it. A freshman in college, she intends to use the Pad vice her laptop. I just may buy another for me. The Retina sold the deal.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Yoselyne Dorante "Yoselyne"
Reviews.Content: I like this product, but I would recommend that apple allows an USB port in this device.Another limitation is that the camera doesn't have flash.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love my iPad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Two Kindles later I finally got an iPad.  There isn't any comparison ..... The iPad is lightning fast, and the Wireless network connection was incredibly easy to set up.  The Kindle Fire can't even access the google play store.

Reviews.Title: I bought it Used and it came like new
Reviews.Author: Cibert
Reviews.Content: Really Great, When this seller said Like new, He Really mean it. Was Like New in its box pefectly wrapped every accesory was in there.And i paid for it 150 dollars less :)

Reviews.Title: Not a great pad

Reviews.Content: I only had it for 5days when it fell off my night stand and the screen literally crunched into a million tiny pieces. I have iPad1 and ipad2 both have dropped numerous times Never cracked!Dealing with Amazon sucked....the gentleman in customer service was unaudible...in the emails they never sent me an RA.THANKS TO AMEX I'll be compensated.

Reviews.Title: should have bought this long time ago!
Reviews.Author: happily retired
Reviews.Content: I wanted to learn apple products and never had any so I decided to start on something simple.  Needed a little bit of help but you can get that from apple for free.  Love this iPad I bought!

Reviews.Title: Apple does it right

Reviews.Content: Apple does it right with the i-pad.  They just need to get the  price down a bit to compete better with newcomers to the market.

Reviews.Title: Best... Tablet.... EVER!
Reviews.Author: Michael O'neil
Reviews.Content: Very powerful, easy to use, clear screen that's crystal clear.. All in all, just a very pleasant device to work with...

Reviews.Title: IPad Purchase

Reviews.Content: I already had an iPad but needed one for my wife.  Since I loaded mine up we only needed a slightly less robust unit and this does the trick

Reviews.Title: APPLE IPAD WITH RETINA DISPLAY

Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT AND IT WORKS GREAT. LOVE THAT IT COMES IN TWO COLORS ALSO. I WOULD RECOMEND THIS TO ANYONE.

Reviews.Title: Apple ipad with Fintie Black Folio Leather Cover

Reviews.Content: make sure when you purchase your new ipad that you use square trade protection plan to protect your purchases .  Keep your ipad in the Finte Folio case cover to protect your investment.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic

Reviews.Content: Bought for my 70 year old Mum and she loves it, easy to use and its got the 64gb memory too.

Reviews.Title: Battery runs down way too fast .....
Reviews.Author: Jeff N. Olsen "Seaeye"
Reviews.Content: Using as an alarm clock ... Start with 100% level at bedtime ... Battery dead before morning ... This Less than one week after purchase ...

Reviews.Title: apple i pad

Reviews.Content: it was for my wife and she was thrilled  with the product. It will take her a little while to get used to the operating system but my son has the I pad and he will assist

Reviews.Title: Great quality

Reviews.Title: This is a life saver!
Reviews.Author: Amy Greer
Reviews.Content: I am a college student and I got this iPad to carry with me on campus. I love my MacBook but it gets heavy when you have to carry a backpack full of textbooks as well. The iPad is much lighter and has all the functions I need for my classes. My backpack is much lighter now and I absolutely LOVE my iPad!!

Reviews.Title: Bought it used, but it was received in "like new' condition

Reviews.Content: I can't believe how much use this is getting in my household. I've had to wrestle it away from my wife and kid to be able to use it at all.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful display
Reviews.Author: Rudolph Schenker
Reviews.Content: I've held out for a long time before buying an ipad and I really love this model. Its very fast and the resolution is tremendous.

Reviews.Title: review

Reviews.Content: I upgraded my ipad and like the new one. I like the way you can take pictures and the inkpad.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase

Reviews.Content: I bought this for my fater who has a older one and loves it.  He takes his ipad with him everywhere he goes.  This is light weight and the picture quality is amazing.  I am so happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love it, sharp picture and meets all my expectations

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT - according to husband

Reviews.Title: good

Reviews.Content: I liked Apple iPad with Retina Display MD510LL/A (16GB, Wi-Fi, Black) Newest version. Its working great and fulfilling the requirement

Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Title: So far so good

Reviews.Title: Reviewing I pad

Reviews.Title: iPad what more can I say
Reviews.Author: M. Lavery "Diver Mike"
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a replacement for one I dropped and. Role.  I am still a big fan of the IPad and have had the. Since gen 1.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Super swimmer
Reviews.Content: The iPad and the iPad mini are very different, but also ver alike. The iPad is useful because it has a bigger screen that is better to play games on. The iPad mini is nice because it is smaller and more portable. Then again the iPad is better to take notes on because it acts more like a laptop because of the size. They are also very alike. For example they are both tablets. Also they are both apple products. That is a little bit about the iPad and iPad mini.

Reviews.Title: new i pad

Reviews.Content: extra sharp and  clear screen and easy to use. fast shipping from Amazon. When you see the screen you realize it's worth a few more dollars

Reviews.Title: Love-Love-Love
Reviews.Author: KING
Reviews.Content: One of the best things I ever bought. In fact I bought one for my granddaughter also. She is a senior in college. She loves hers also. Helps her with her studies better than a computer. I love dealing with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: It can do just about everything
Reviews.Author: Richard M. Noble
Reviews.Content: This is a first class product.  Even with the larger screen it's difficult to type with extra large hands (not really the i-pads problem).  Adding a keyboard is a great investment.and the Logitech seems to be the best now available.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product
Reviews.Author: Sandie

I am an avid Apple customer, but I try to refrain from buying the pricier items except for my Macbook Pro, since I needed a computer for school. But, I'm very glad I bought this. Nothing comes close to the quality of the ipad and if I don't want to lug around my Macbook, I'm able to take this and read my text books, after transferring them to the kindle app. It's a great investment that I'm very happy I made.

Reviews.Title: Think I will like it

Reviews.Title: Protection

Reviews.Title: good service

Reviews.Title: Excellent investment

Reviews.Title: Awesome, Great Product

Reviews.Content: Don't know why it took us so long to get one, but it is used by everyone whenever they see it free - will probably need another.

Reviews.Title: iPad 4

Reviews.Title: Love this iPad!

Reviews.Title: great I Pad

Reviews.Content: I love this IPad, have tried several others before but this one is the s***, everyone should invest in the real tablet.

The "FACE TIME" Allows direct connection to children and grand kids.Unit provides all that was promised and more. I would recommend to everyone if you can meet the Apple price mark.

Reviews.Title: Easy to operate

Reviews.Content: Best and most easy-to-use system on earth. But there are some flaws of the screen, does not present that good as in the commercials

Reviews.Title: First iPad

Reviews.Title: Ipad nice

Reviews.Title: Liked it but......

Reviews.Content: I like this ipad but liked the older version better as the charger was more convenient and it would let me load itunes playlists from my laptop. This Ipad doesn't let me save any music playlists from my computer. Its ok but newer is not always better.

Reviews.Title: Really loving its intuitiveness

Reviews.Content: I bought this product thinking it would be like a mac book pro. But know its just a tab that you touch.. i mean serious. how am i suppose to do serious work on this?

Reviews.Title: I Think I should have been offered my choice of  no. 4 or no. 5 !
Reviews.Author: Don W. Boucher
Reviews.Content: I no more get it and guess what..?  That's right a newer IPad comes out! That just don t seem right ,  I Think I should have been advise and given a choice, don't you think So?  Don W. Boucher

Ii is not like theKindle Fire, Full Color 7" Multi-touch Display, Wi-Fi. While I think this I say that maybe the Ipad 2 is better . I am wondering how invented this piece of junk . I say that the Kindle Fire is the way to go .
